name: Neuron Global, Inc.
description:
Neuron Global is a dual-shore software development company located in New York City and Manila, Philippines. Neuron Global possesses a variety of technical competencies, but our core strength is the .NET programming language and Microsoft-related technologies.
We specialize in partnering with US-based development shops - either software development companies or Managed Service Providers (MSP's) with an in-house application development team - to provide them with scalability at a reasonable price.
Our operations facility is managed by expats from the US and UK who live in the Philippines year-round. This management approach, combined with our sales, marketing, and project management office in NYC minimizes many of the pain points people typically feel when working with an offshore development company.
